```{r fun-create-single-event-df}

# Function to create table with single event per subject and added variables "death", "recovery", "censored"

create_single_event_df <- function(df, 
																 event = c("ICU", "shock", "MV"), 
																 time_threshold = 48, 
																 by = unic_patient_id,
																 treatment = combined_efferon, 
																 ...) {
	
	if ({{event}} == "shock") {
			df_survival <- df %>%
  		filter(shock_T0 == "TRUE") %>% 
  		mutate(
      		event_status = case_when(
      			shock_first_end_status == "death" ~ "death",
      			shock_first_end_status == "recovery" ~ "recovery",
      			is.na(shock_first_end_status) ~ "censored"
  				),
    			event_time = shock_dur_T0_first_end
  		) 

	} else if ({{event}} == "MV") {
			df_survival <- df %>%
  		filter(MV_T0 == "TRUE") %>% 
  		mutate(
      		event_status = case_when(
      			MV_first_end_status == "death" ~ "death",
      			MV_first_end_status == "recovery" ~ "recovery",
      			is.na(MV_first_end_status) ~ "censored"
  				),
    			event_time = MV_dur_T0_first_end
  		) 
		
	} else if ({{event}} == "ICU") {
			df_survival <- df %>%
			mutate(
    	    event_status = case_when(
      			ICU_first_end_status == "death" ~ "death",
      			ICU_first_end_status == "recovery" ~ "recovery",
      			is.na(ICU_first_end_status) ~ "censored"
    			),
    			event_time = ICU_dur_T0_first_end
    )
	} else { stop("Incorrect event type")	}
	
	
# Делаем датафрейм с единичным упоминанием события на пациента
		
	single_event_df <- df_survival %>%
	  mutate(event_status = factor(event_status, levels = c("censored", "recovery", "death")),
  	       across(where(is.character), as.factor)) %>%
  	filter(event_time <= {{time_threshold}}) %>% 
  	group_by({{by}}) %>%
  	summarise(
    	treatment = first({{treatment}}),
    	event_status = first(event_status),
    	event_time = if_else(all(is.na(event_time)), NA_real_, max(event_time, na.rm = TRUE))
  	) %>%
  	ungroup()

	return(single_event_df)
}
```


```{r fun-ggcuminc-custom}

ggcuminc_custom <- function(df, 
														outcome = c("death", "recovery"), 
														xmax),
														conf_int = TRUE,
														risktable = TRUE,
														pvalue = TRUE
														) {
	
	df %>% ggcuminc(outcome = {{outcome}}[1]) +
	scale_y_continuous(limits = 0:1, breaks = seq(0, 1, 0.1)) +
	scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, xmax), breaks = seq(0, xmax, 5)) +
	scale_fill_manual(values = c("Control" = "#ea9999", "Efferon" = "#4285f4")) +
  labs(
#    title = paste0("Cumulative Risk of ", stringr::str_to_title({{outcome}})),
#    y = "Cumulative Probability",
    x = "Time, days",
#    color = "Treatment Group"
  ) + 
  { if (conf_int) add_confidence_interval() } + 
  { if (risktable) add_risktable(risktable_height = 0.15, 
  															 size = 5,
  															 risktable_stats = "cum.event",
  															 theme = theme_risktable_boxed(
  															 axis.text.y.size = 14, 
																 plot.title.size = 18
  															 )) } +
  { if (pvalue) add_pvalue(location = "annotation", x = xmax - 3, y = 0.05, size = 6) } +
  guides(fill = "none") +
	theme_bw() +
	theme(
	axis.title = element_text(size = 18),
	axis.text = element_text(size = 14),
	title = element_text(size = 22),
	legend.position = "none"
	)
}	


```



```{r assess-cuminc}

icu_cuminc_death <- cuminc(Surv(event_time, event_status) ~ treatment, 
										 data = create_single_event_df(df = sepsis_HA_df_analyze, event = "ICU", time_threshold = 50))

icu_table_recovery <- icu_cuminc_death$tidy %>% 
								filter(outcome == "recovery") %>% 
								mutate(estimate.adj = 1 - estimate, .after = estimate) %>%
								mutate(conf.low.adj = 1 - conf.high, .after = conf.low) %>%
								mutate(conf.high.adj = 1 - conf.low, .after = conf.high)

shock_cuminc_death <- cuminc(Surv(event_time, event_status) ~ treatment, 
										 data = create_single_event_df(df = sepsis_HA_df_analyze, event = "shock", time_threshold = 40))

MV_cuminc_death <- cuminc(Surv(event_time, event_status) ~ treatment, 
										 data = create_single_event_df(df = sepsis_HA_df_analyze, event = "MV", time_threshold = 50))

```



```{r plot-cuminc, fig.height = 10, fig.width=8}

icu_plot_cuminc_death <- icu_cuminc_death %>%	ggcuminc_custom(xmax = 50) +  
													geom_text(data = data.frame(lab = "Overall in ICU", x = 50, y = 0.9),
										 					aes(label = lab, x = x, y = y), size = 10,  hjust = 1)

icu_plot_cuminc_both <- icu_plot_cuminc_death + 
													geom_step(data = icu_table_recovery, 
																		aes(x = time, y = estimate.adj, colour = strata), 
																		direction = "hv", 
																		na.rm = FALSE) +
													geom_ribbon(data = icu_table_recovery, 
																		aes(x = time, fill = strata, ymin = conf.low.adj, ymax = conf.high.adj),
																		na.rm = TRUE,
																		alpha = 0.2) +
													geom_text(data = data.frame(lab = c("Recovery", "Death"), x = 18, y = c(0.9, 0.1)),
										 								aes(label = lab, x = x, y = y), size = 8,  hjust = 1)

MV_plot_cuminc_death + labs(x = "Time, h")+ theme(title = element_text(size = 24, hjust = 0.5), legend.position = "none", axis.title.y = element_blank() )



shock_plot_cuminc_death <- shock_cuminc_death %>% ggcuminc_custom(xmax = 35) + 
														geom_text(data = data.frame(lab = "With shock", x = 35, y = 0.9),
										 					aes(label = lab, x = x, y = y), size = 10, hjust = 1)
									
MV_plot_cuminc_death <- MV_cuminc_death %>% ggcuminc_custom(xmax = 50) + 
													geom_text(data = data.frame(lab = "With ventilator", x = 50, y = 0.9),
										 					aes(label = lab, x = x, y = y), size = 10, hjust = 1)
```

```{r}
sepsis_HA_df_joint <- readRDS(here::here(path_to_data, "/processed/joint_sepsis.rds"))

icu_single_event_joint <- sepsis_HA_df_joint %>%
		filter(time_point == 0) %>%
		mutate(ICU_death_status = if_else(ICU_first_end_status == "death" & ICU_dur_T0_first_end <= 30, 1, 0), 
					 .after = ICU_first_end_status) %>% 
		mutate(ICU_death_time = if_else(ICU_first_end_status == "death" & ICU_dur_T0_first_end <= 30, ICU_dur_T0_first_end, 30), 
					 .after = ICU_dur_T0_first_end) %>% 
		mutate(shock_recovery_status = if_else(shock_first_end_status == "recovery" & shock_dur_T0_first_end <= 30, 1, 0), 
					 .after =	shock_first_end_status) %>%
		mutate(shock_recovery_time = if_else(shock_first_end_status == "recovery" & shock_dur_T0_first_end <= 30, shock_dur_T0_first_end, 30), 
					 .after =	shock_dur_T0_first_end)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
model_0 <- coxph(Surv(ICU_death_time, ICU_death_status) ~ combined_efferon, data = icu_single_event_joint) 

model_0 %>% summary
model_0 %>% tbl_regression(exp = TRUE)
model_0 %>% ggcoxdiagnostics(type = "schoenfeld")
model_0 %>% cox.zph() %>% print()
model_0 %>% cox.zph() %>% ggcoxzph()
```
